name: XChords

screenshots.caption: Sample C chord SVG image in Firefox 1.5 Beta1

short_description: XChords is utility for converting XML guitar chord definitions to SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) images and then further to JPEG/PNG/TIFF/PDF documents. Project includes XML Schema and/or DTD. It uses XSLT as the main engine (XSLT->SVG)
